sub-events.comment: Switch to Game mode if Countdown timer has reached 0
In Future mode, automatically create new Nibbles every so often
Use Counters in trails to designate when they should begin fading
Return to normal speed after effect from Slow Nibbles
Add a cool effect using Nibblets
Cloud Nibbles - handled in trail rendering, makes trail cloudy and easy to hit
Flash Nibbles - fades in the FadeFlash, blinding player
Spawn trails only when in Game mode
UP - Zoom in and speed up
DOWN - Zoom out and speed down
SPACE - Slows speed down to minimum
Keyboard clicks after Game Over lead to Fade mode
SPACE - Slows speed down to minimum
Mouse clicks after Game Over lead to Fade mode
Subtract from NibbleEveryXSeconds so that more Nibbles get created as Player gets more Nibbles
Add a cool effect using Nibblets
Trail collisions - first collisions will set boolean Safe to false, to allow for safety cushion
Is trail outside of safety cushion and is its opacity within range for player to die from?
